titles.title: A bill to protect States and Federal judges by clarifying that Federal judicial immunity covers all acts undertaken by judges pursuant to legal authority.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/28/2005--Introduced. Grants immunity to federal and state judges against any federal civil cause of action arising from the discharge of any legislatively or constitutionally authorized duty, except for actions involving malice.
